products.title: Light Beige (1085) (Blackout)
products.description: The velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day. Total blackout - best on the market. Oeko-tex certified. Stepless positioning. Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window. Available in 24 colours. Installs in minutes.
